od.oracle.apps.xxom.atp.pool
Class ConnectionPoolMgr

java.lang.Object
  od.oracle.apps.xxom.atp.pool.ConnectionPoolMgr

public class ConnectionPoolMgr
extends java.lang.Object

Class implements the Oracle OCI connection pooling. Provides a singleton implementation.

Constructor Detail

ConnectionPoolMgr

protected ConnectionPoolMgr()
Singleton Implementation of the OCI connection Pool. This constructor is protected to enforce creation of only one instance of this class.
